<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loongarchdagtodagisel/#a36d1b77a885effd5cefdd787a7935226"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loongarchdagtodagisel/#a36d1b77a885effd5cefdd787a7935226">LoongArchDAGToDAGISel::selectShiftMask</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ShiftWidth,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> &amp;ShAmt) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Shift instructions on LoongArch only read the lower 5 or 6 bits of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// shift amount. If there is an AND on the shift amount, we can bypass it if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it doesn&#39;t affect any of those bits.</span></CodeLine>
